description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A terrorist organization is loose in your city. They are masters of disguise and can expertly hide in a crowd.  You are the best sniper we’ve got.  It’s your job to take them out!
